title: 'Such an easy game to ref' - Dyche 'stunned' by 'bizarre' VAR calls
subtitle: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche is critical of the officials over some "bizarre" decisions in his side's late 2-1 defeat by Manchester City.
full_text: Nottingham Forest manager Sean Dyche is critical of the officials over some "bizarre" decisions in his side's late 2-1 defeat by Manchester City.
